definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Early today, the body of a 25-year-old man was found in West Town.
sentences.chinese: 今天一早，在西城发现一具25岁男子的尸体。

sentences.english: The next day morning, the professor would be surprised to open the door.
sentences.chinese: 次日一早，教授打开屋门便大吃一惊。

sentences.english: Let's go to the fair tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 明天一早我们一起去赶大集吧。

sentences.english: On Tuesday morning a truck stopped at the mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 星期二一早，一辆卡车停在邮筒旁。

sentences.english: The next morning when the sun was in the sky, she discovered something beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一早，太阳出来了，她发现一些极美的东西。

sentences.english: Thee second day early in the morning, we are ready to depart, they buy a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一早，我们准备起程，上香兰买自行车。

sentences.english: This bear had been fishing in the river on this morning. It climbed onto the bank and laid down in the grass.
sentences.chinese: 在河里捕了一早的鱼，棕熊爬到岸边卧在草地上。

sentences.english: Hearty chuckles from the early morning crowd just settling into their seats.
sentences.chinese: 一早进入会场落座的人群里传来会心的笑声。

sentences.english: Considering the time，we have decided to start early tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 考虑到时间，我们已经决定明天一早出发。

sentences.english: It will be on the front pages of America’s newspapers the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 这将成为美国众多报纸翌日一早的头版新闻。

sentences.english: They left early to catch the 7.30 train.
sentences.chinese: 他们一早出发去赶7点半的火车。

sentences.english: We got up early, put on our suits and prepared to meet the bride.
sentences.chinese: 一早起来，我们两个都换了正装，准备去接新娘。

sentences.english: Ping Jue wakes ups and then receives small three telephoneses of friends early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 冯爵一早醒来就收到朋友小三的电话。

sentences.english: Early the next morning supergroup to Cheng Xi room to see her also sent the gift to Cheng Xi.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一早超群到程曦的房间看她还送了礼物给程曦。

sentences.english: Jo was the first to wake in the gray dawn of Christmas morning.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节一早，天刚蒙蒙亮，乔便第一个醒来。

sentences.english: We have to get off early tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们明天一早必须动身。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
first thing in the morning/at daybreak
that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
